saferhtmltag-desc: SaferHTMLTag is an extension that prevents unauthorized users from editing pages where the <html> tag is defined when raw html ($wgRawHtml) is enabled.
saferhtmltag-html-detected-in-edit-page: An HTML tag has been detected in this page. Only authorized users will be able to modify its content.
saferhtmltag-denied-edit: The page cannot be edited because it contains an html tag and you don't have the required permission. If you wish to have this page modified, [{{fullurl:Special:ListUsers|group=sysop}} contact an administrator].
